extension.name: JMod Contact
extension.author: Sean Casco
extension.description: A contact form module which is easy to use and is easily manageble by site administrator.

field.name: recipient_email_id
field.label: Recipient Email Id
field.description: Please provide recipient email id who will get contacts email.

field.name: from_name
field.label: Mail From Name
field.description: The name of the message's sender

field.name: from_email
field.label: Mail From Email
field.description: Sender's Email

field.name: email_label
field.label: Email
field.description: Please enter label for email field.

field.name: subject_label
field.label: Subject Label
field.description: Please enter label for subject field.

field.name: message_label
field.label: Message
field.description: Please enter label for message field.

field.name: button_text
field.label: Button Text
field.description: Text for the button

field.name: thanks_message
field.label: Thanks message
field.description: This message will show after user sent message successfully

field.name: error_message
field.default: Message could not be sent to recipient. Please your entries and make sure all entries are right and try again.
field.label: Error message
field.description: This message will show after user message sending fail

field.name: email_required_message
field.label: Email Required Message
field.description: This message will show when user does not enter email in email field

field.name: subject_required_message
field.label: Subject Required Message
field.description: This message will show when user does not enter subject in subject field

field.name: msg_required_message
field.label: Message Required Message
field.description: This message will show when user does not enter message in message field

field.name: invalid_email_message
field.label: Invalid Email Message
field.description: This message will show when user enter an invalid email

field.name: wrong_antispam
field.label: Wrong Anti-Spam Text
field.description: The text to show when the user fails to pass the anti-spam check

field.name: pre_text
field.label: Small Intro
field.description: A small text shown before (above) the message form. HTML is welcome!

field.name: thanks_message_text_color
field.label: Thanks Message Text Color
field.description: Color of Thanks message text.

field.name: error_text_color
field.label: Error Text Color
field.description: The color of the Error text.

field.name: email_width
field.label: Email Width
field.description: Width in letters of the email input

field.name: subject_width
field.label: Subject Width
field.description: Width in letters of the subject input

field.name: message_width
field.label: Message Width
field.description: Width in columns of the message textarea

field.name: button_width
field.label: Button Width
field.description: Width in percent of the send button

field.name: label_pos
field.label: Label Position
field.description: The position of the labels relative to the inputboxes

field.name: addcss
field.default: div.contact_form tr, div.contact_form td { border: none; padding: 3px; }
field.label: Custom CSS
field.description: Custom CSS for the form.

field.name: exact_url
field.label: Exact URL
field.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. If your site is http and your server/host supports https this should be No.

field.name: disable_https
field.label: Disable HTTPS
field.description: This is an advanced option about the url retrieval way. Please enable it if Contact Form posts in https and your site is http.

field.name: fixed_url
field.label: Fixed URL
field.description: A simple solution to people that want to use Contact Form in an exact page. Change this to Yes and write the URL of Contact Form in the Fixed URL Address parameter

field.name: fixed_url_address
field.label: Fixed URL Address
field.description: If fixed url is true, this address is used for Contact Form to post itself.

field.name: enable_anti_spam
field.label: Enable Anti-spam
field.description: Enable this to use the anti-spam question for anti-spam control

field.name: anti_spam_q
field.label: Anti-Spam Question
field.description: A small text question, preventing you from every automated spam

field.name: anti_spam_a
field.label: Anti-Spam Answer
field.description: The correct answer to the anti-spam question

field.name: anti_spam_position
field.label: Anti-Spam Position
field.description: The anti-spam position, relative to the Contact Form form.

field.name: enable_recaptcha
field.label: Enable ReCaptcha Integration
field.description: Enable ReCaptcha Integration

field.name: recaptcha_public_key
field.label: ReCaptcha Public Key
field.description: ReCaptcha Public Key

field.name: recaptcha_private_key
field.label: ReCaptcha Private Key
field.description: ReCaptcha Private Key

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: If you want to apply a custom style, change this class suffix.

field.name: custom_field_1_enable
field.label: Enable
field.description: Please click yes if want to show field on front end

field.name: custom_field_2_enable
field.label: Enable
field.description: Please click yes if want to show field on front end

field.name: custom_field_3_enable
field.label: Enable
field.description: Please click yes if want to show field on front end

field.name: cache
field.label: Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

field.name: cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached
